Class playn.core.TextFormat

Removed Constructors
TextFormat(Font, float, Alignment) @deprecated Use TextFormat() and configuration methods.
TextFormat(Font, float, Alignment, boolean) @deprecated {@code wrapWidth} and {@code align} are no longer supported.
 

Added Constructors
TextFormat(Font) Creates a text format instance with the specified font.
 

Removed Methods
boolean shouldWrap() Returns true if line wrapping is desired.
TextFormat withAlignment(Alignment) @deprecated Use Graphics.layoutText(String,TextFormat,TextWrap) and render the wrapped lines individually (aligning them as desired).
TextFormat withWrapWidth(float) @deprecated Use Graphics.layoutText(String,TextFormat,TextWrap) and render the wrapped lines individually.
TextFormat withWrapping(float, Alignment) @deprecated Use Graphics.layoutText(String,TextFormat,TextWrap) and render the wrapped lines individually.
 

Added Methods
TextFormat withFont(String, float) Returns a clone of this text format with the font configured as specified.
TextFormat withFont(String, Style, float) Returns a clone of this text format with the font configured as specified.
 

Removed Fields
Alignment align The alignment to use for multiline text.
float wrapWidth The width at which to wrap lines of text (or Float.MAX_VALUE if the text should not be wrapped.
